item.title: 美国 30 年期固定利率抵押贷款升至 6.79% 的四个月新高
item.description: 由于担心当选总统唐纳德-特朗普提出的经济政策会刺激通货膨胀，美国抵押贷款利率本周升至四个月来的最高点，并可能进一步上升。【原文：U.S. mortgage rates increased to a four-month high this week and could rise further amid fears that President-elect Donald Trump's proposed economic policies could stoke inflation.】

item.title: 倍耐力第三季度运营利润增幅高于预期
item.description: 意大利轮胎制造商倍耐力（Pirelli）周四表示，得益于销量、产品组合和效率的增长，其第三季度营业利润增幅超过预期。【原文：Italian tyre maker Pirelli said on Thursday its operating profit rose more than expected in the third quarter, thanks to growing volumes, product mix and efficiencies.】

item.title: 特朗普不太可能实施全面关税计划 - 标普全球
item.description: 评级机构S&P Global周四在一份报告中称，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普承诺对进口商品普遍征收10%的关税，对中国商品征收60%的关税，这很可能只是谈判的一个起点。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump's pledge to impose a universal 10% tariff on imports and 60% on Chinese goods is likely only a starting point for negotiations, ratings agency S&P Global said in a note on Thursday.】

item.title: 先锋公司将向被巨额税单困扰的共同基金投资者支付 4000 万美元
item.description: 美国最大的共同基金资产管理公司先锋集团（Vanguard Group）同意支付 4000 万美元，以了结一项诉讼，该诉讼称先锋集团让其广受欢迎的目标日期退休基金的普通投资者承担了出人意料的巨额税费。【原文：Vanguard Group, the largest U.S. manager of mutual fund assets, agreed to pay $40 million to settle a lawsuit claiming it stuck ordinary investors in its popular target-date retirement funds with surprisingly large tax bills.】

item.title: 因担心特朗普征收关税，斯蒂芬-麦登将削减中国采购量
item.description: 史蒂文-麦登公司高管周四表示，在唐纳德-特朗普赢得美国总统大选后，公司正在迅速将产品采购从中国转移到其他国家。【原文：Steven Madden executives said on Thursday the company was working quickly to shift product sourcing out of China to other countries after Donald Trump's U.S. presidential election victory.】

item.title: 美国大选欣喜消退，特朗普媒体股价下滑
item.description: 特朗普媒体与科技集团（Trump Media & Technology Group）股价周四跌至两周低点，因为对唐纳德-特朗普赢得美国总统大选的投机性押注在他获胜一天后失去了动力。【原文：Shares of Trump Media & Technology Group slumped to a two-week low on Thursday, as speculative bets on Donald Trump winning the U.S. presidential election lost steam a day after his victory.】

item.title: 美国蜂窝将以 10 亿美元向 AT&T 出售部分频谱许可
item.description: 美国蜂窝公司（United States Cellular）周四表示，已同意将用于传输移动电话信号和高速数据服务的部分频谱许可出售给 AT&T，交易金额为 10.2 亿美元。【原文：United States Cellular said on Thursday it has agreed to sell a portion of spectrum licenses used to transmit mobile phone signals and high-speed data services to AT&T in a $1.02 billion deal.】

item.title: 宾利将于 2026 年推出 SUV 电动车，并将插电式混合动力车的销售期延长至 2035 年
item.description: 英国豪华汽车制造商宾利周四表示，将于2026年推出首款电动汽车，并表示将继续销售插电式混合动力汽车直至2035年，正式放弃了此前提出的到2030年实现完全电动化的目标。【原文：British luxury carmaker Bentley said on Thursday it will launch its first electric car in 2026 and said it will keep selling plug-in hybrids until 2035, formally abandoning a previous goal of going fully electric by 2030.】

item.title: 波音准备恢复 737 生产，FAA 将加强监管
item.description: 美国联邦航空管理局（Federal Aviation Administration）周四表示，在本周早些时候结束的为期53天的罢工之后，波音公司准备恢复737 MAX的生产，美国联邦航空管理局将加强监督。【原文：The Federal Aviation Administration said Thursday it will boost oversight as Boeing prepares to resume 737 MAX production following a 53-day strike that ended earlier this week.】

item.title: 美国 9 月份批发库存修正后有所下降
item.description: 由于机动车库存大幅下降，9 月份美国批发库存的降幅超过了最初的预期。【原文：U.S. wholesale inventories fell more than initially thought in September amid a sharp decline in motor vehicle stocks.】

item.title: 美国银行将从特朗普宽松的资本和兼并政策中获益
item.description: 业内专家和分析师表示，随着前总统唐纳德-特朗普重返白宫，银行业有望大获全胜，共和党监管机构有望放宽资本规则和兼并审批。【原文：The banking industry is expected to win big as former President Donald Trump returns to the White House, ushering in Republican regulators who are expected to ease capital rules and merger approvals, industry experts and analysts said.】

item.title: Datadog 上调年度预测，押注人工智能驱动的网络安全需求
item.description: 云监控公司 Datadog 周四上调了年度营收和利润预期，押注于人工智能支持的网络安全产品需求的加速增长。【原文：Cloud monitoring firm Datadog raised its annual revenue and profit forecasts on Thursday, betting on accelerating demand for its AI-backed cybersecurity products.】

item.title: 主要券商预计美联储 11 月降息 25 个基点
item.description: 摩根大通、巴克莱和高盛等主要券商预测，美国联邦储备委员会将在 11 月 6-7 日的会议上降息 25 个基点。【原文：Major brokerages including J.P.Morgan, Barclays and Goldman Sachs have forecast a 25-basis-point interest-rate cut by the U.S. Federal Reserve at its November 6-7 meeting.】

item.title: 墨西哥经济部长表示希望就特斯拉工厂计划向马斯克了解情况
item.description: 墨西哥经济部长埃布拉德周四告诉当地电台，他将设法尽快与亿万富翁、特斯拉公司首席执行官埃隆-马斯克会面，以确定他在墨西哥北部建立电动汽车工厂的计划。【原文：Mexico's Economy Minister Ebrard will try to meet soon with billionaire and Tesla's chief executive Elon Musk to determine his plans for an electric car factory in northern Mexico, he told local radio on Thursday.】

item.title: 由于需求和价格上涨，WK Kellogg 第三季度业绩超出预期
item.description: 受消费者对 Froot Loops 和 Apple Jacks 等即食麦片强劲需求的推动，WK Kellogg 周四公布的第三季度营收和利润超出华尔街预期。【原文：WK Kellogg beat Wall Street estimates for third-quarter revenue and profit on Thursday, driven by robust consumer demand for its ready-to-eat cereals, including Froot Loops and Apple Jacks.】

item.title: Stellantis 与英飞凌宣布合作开发下一代汽车架构
item.description: 汽车制造商 Stellantis 和德国芯片制造商英飞凌周四表示，双方将合作进一步开发汽车制造商下一代汽车的动力架构。【原文：Automaker Stellantis and German chipmaker Infineon said on Thursday they would cooperate to further develop power architecture for the automaker's next generation vehicles.】

item.title: 意大利削减对汽车工业的支持以避免资助中国制造的汽车
item.description: 意大利经济部长周四表示，意大利政府计划削减此前为支持本国汽车工业而预留的资金，以避免资助中国制造的汽车。【原文：Italy's government plans to cut funds previously set aside to support the country's automotive industry to avoid funding cars made in China, the economy minister said on Thursday.】

item.title: 美国第三季度工人生产率温和增长；劳动力成本上升
item.description: 第三季度美国工人生产率温和增长，导致劳动力成本逐步放缓，这可能给通胀前景蒙上阴影。【原文：U.S. worker productivity increased moderately in the third quarter, resulting in only a gradual slowdown in labor costs that could cast a cloud over the inflation outlook.】

item.title: 美国每周申请失业救济人数温和增长
item.description: 上周新申请失业救济金的美国人数量略有上升，表明劳动力市场状况没有实质性变化，并强化了飓风和罢工导致 10 月份就业增长几乎停滞的观点。【原文：The number of Americans filing new applications for unemployment benefits rose marginally last week, suggesting no material change in labor market conditions and reinforcing views that hurricanes and strikes had resulted in job growth almost stalling in October.】

item.title: 日航-住友合资公司获得订购多达 100 辆 Archer 空中出租车的权利
item.description: Archer Aviation 周四表示，日本航空公司和住友商事株式会社的合资企业已获得最多 100 辆电动空中出租车的订单权，价值 5 亿美元。【原文：Archer Aviation said on Thursday a joint venture between Japan Airlines and Sumitomo Corp had secured the right to place orders for up to 100 of its electric air-taxis worth $500 million.】

item.title: Elf Beauty 与 Dollar General 合作，豪赌农村市场
item.description: Elf Beauty 是一家平价化妆品生产商，该公司正将赌注押在农村市场以及与 Dollar General 的合作上，以推动其扩张，同时应对美国化妆品行业增长放缓的问题，因为在美国，购物者对价格昂贵的化妆品望而却步。【原文：Elf Beauty , a maker of affordable cosmetics, is betting on rural markets and a tie-up with Dollar General to fuel its expansion as it hedges against a slowdown in the U.S. cosmetic industry where shoppers have shied away from pricey makeup.】

item.title: 奥迪在中国发布全新电动车品牌，不带四环标志
item.description: 奥迪周四在中国发布了一个新的电动汽车品牌，其汽车将只使用奥迪名称，而不使用其标志性的四环标志，此举旨在吸引全球最大汽车市场的年轻客户。【原文：Audi on Thursday unveiled a new electric vehicle brand in China whose cars will sport just the name AUDI and not its signature four-ring logo, a move aimed at attracting younger customers in the world's largest auto market.】

item.title: 价格上涨抑制需求，好时下调年度预期
item.description: 好时公司周四下调了全年营收和利润预期，原因是其巧克力、糖果和咸味零食产品一再涨价，抑制了市场需求，第三季度业绩不及华尔街预期。【原文：Hershey trimmed its annual revenue and profit forecasts on Thursday after missing Wall Street estimates for third-quarter, as repeated price hikes have dampened demand for its chocolates, confectionery, and salty snack products.】

item.title: 高端服装需求强劲，拉尔夫-劳伦上调年度销售预期
item.description: 由于北美、欧洲和中国市场对拉尔夫-劳伦（Ralph Lauren）电缆针织毛衣和牛津衬衫的需求稳定，该公司周四上调了全年销售预期，季度收入超过预期，使该公司股价在盘前交易中上涨了 6%。【原文：Ralph Lauren raised its annual sales forecast after topping quarterly revenue estimates on Thursday, on steady demand for its cable-knit sweaters and Oxford shirts in North America, Europe and China, sending shares of the company 6% up in premarket trading.】

item.title: 独家报道联合利华、宝洁面临特朗普威胁征收墨西哥关税的风险
item.description: 路透社独家披露的数据显示，如果美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普继续威胁对墨西哥征收关税，宝洁和联合利华等大型包装商品公司将面临风险。【原文：Procter & Gamble and Unilever are among big packaged goods companies that would be exposed if U.S. President-elect Donald Trump goes ahead with a threat to impose tariffs on Mexico, data seen exclusively by Reuters shows.】

item.title: 英格兰银行决策者在降息后发表讲话
item.description: 英国央行周四降息，这是自 2020 年以来的第二次降息，并表示未来的降息可能是渐进的，因为在新政府的首份预算案之后，通胀和经济增长都有所提高。【原文：The Bank of England cut interest rates on Thursday for only the second time since 2020 and said future reductions were likely to be gradual, seeing higher inflation and growth after the new government's first budget.】

item.title: 杜克能源公司预计飓风恢复成本高达 29 亿美元
item.description: 杜克能源公司（Duke Energy）周四表示，该公司估计恢复受飓风黛比（Debby）、米尔顿（Milton）和海伦（Helene）破坏的设施的总成本在 24 亿至 29 亿美元之间。【原文：Duke Energy said on Thursday it estimates the total cost to restore facilities damaged by Hurricanes Debby, Milton and Helene to be in the range of $2.4 billion to $2.9 billion.】

item.title: 华纳兄弟发现公司（Warner Bros Discovery）营收不及预期，制片厂部门业绩疲软
item.description: 华纳兄弟发现公司（Warner Bros Discovery）周四公布的第三季度营收不及华尔街预期，原因是其制片厂业务受到大片上映减少的影响。【原文：Warner Bros Discovery missed Wall Street estimates for third-quarter revenue on Thursday, as its studio business took a hit from fewer blockbuster releases.】

item.title: 因成本战略和投入成本降低，Under Armour上调利润预期
item.description: 运动服装制造商 Under Armour 周四上调了年度利润预期，将赌注押在了投入成本的降低和成本节约策略上，比如在自己的商店和网站上提供更低的折扣。【原文：Sportswear maker Under Armour raised its annual profit forecast on Thursday, betting on lower input costs and cost-saving strategies such as offering lower discounts at its own stores and website.】

item.title: 诺和诺德股价创 9 个月新低，因 2025 年指导计划受挫
item.description: 丹麦制药商诺和诺德（Novo Nordisk）的股价在前一个交易日大涨超过8%后，周四创下了9个多月来的新低，原因是明年的业绩指引令人失望，给其广受欢迎的减肥药Wegovy的强劲销售增长蒙上了阴影。【原文：Danish drugmaker Novo Nordisk's shares hit an over 9-month low on Thursday after surging more than 8% the previous day, as underwhelming guidance for next year overshadowed strong sales growth for its popular Wegovy weight-loss drug.】
